page.title: 06BUILDINGS IN LOWER LYDBROOK
page.content:
On Thursday 6th June we visited the places below-: Lower Lydbrook Bishops Wood Kerne Bridge Goodrich symonds Yat Rock
{Lower Lydbrook In Lower Lydbrook which is in square 1 we found 2 pubs,The Courtfield and The Forge Hammer.The Courtfield was built in the 13th or 14th century it is made of dark blue-grey slates on the roof,brick and plaster.The Forge Hammer was built in the 18th century and made of stone and wood.There is also an 18th century house which is owned by Dr.McMinn.It is made of coloured bricks and the shape of the porch is curved.
